LanguageData.SmartWorkMode_RequireDormantGroup: Require existing dormant self-charge control group for smart work mode self-charging
LanguageData.SmartWorkMode_FirstDefaultWorkMode: Default work mode for first control group
LanguageData.SmartWorkMode_SecondDefaultWorkMode: Default work mode for second control group
LanguageData.SmartWorkMode_AdditionalDefaultWorkMode: Default work mode for additional control groups
LanguageData.SmartWorkMode_ClickToChangeSmartShutdown: Click to change area for smart work mode self-charging.
LanguageData.SmartWorkMode_SetToSmartWorkModeToChange: Switch to smart work mode to change this.
